creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 2 poems by Shinsho_tei Shigenari and Banritei Hiromaro
markings: swastika mark(circle mark) above the title
medium: Woodblock print (surimono), ink and color on paper
text: The two women in the picuture are Kurehatori(shite) and Ayahatori(tsure) who are weavers came from China.
title: Kureha Village
